column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When I bit into this pizza... I thought to myself
column2: I need to order some more ASAP... I will need at least two more this week. It was just sensational. The butter
column3: crispy crust was just delicious and the cheese was in a class of it's own. It literally is not allowed to be mentioned with any other regular pizza that I dine on.
